#summary The JCatapult Ant ide plugin

= Introduction =

This plugin provides applications with the ability to generate IntelliJ and Eclipse classpath files. More specifically, this plugin assumes that you are running IntelliJ 7 with Eclipse classpath storage or Eclipse (any version). This only generates the Eclipse .classpath file.

= Targets =

The plugin provides these targets:

== ide ==

Creates a new .classpath file that includes the classpath generated by calling Savant to resolve all the project dependencies.
